normalised: Hey, for my trip to Kerala last month, the houseboat stay cost me around rupee fifteen thousand per night. Auto rides were like rupee fifty to one hundred depending on the distance. Food expenses, including those delicious Kerala meals, came to about rupee one thousand per day. And don't forget the entry tickets to places like Fort Kochi; those were roughly rupee fifty per spot. All in all, it was a pretty budget-friendly trip.
